TopicTitle: NASA Asteroid Redirect Mission Replica, Picture Heavy

Articles.Content:
Hi!

I was working for some time on a the Kerbal version of NASA's ARM mission. I wanted to recreate it as close as possible to the original.

Here is the album: http://imgur.com/a/ilCv8

The mission is split in two parts: The first part is about a small robotic craft intended to redirect an asteroid and park it in lunar orbit. The second part of the mission features an Orion spacecraft that rendezvous with the asteroid.

I used only one mod for the fairings.

What do you think?
